item.description:
Hi there Incubators!

I hope some of you got to enjoy the Boston Improv Festival last weekend.

I had the chance to see some shows and take a great workshop which I am going to pass down to you all at this weeks incubator. We are going to have lots of fun with some new games that will really allow you to surprise yourselves in your improv.

Remember there's no experience required, so if you have yet to attend, make this your first!!!

Any questions? Let me know!

Come on over and head to my backyard, I'm going to try to hook up some awesome lighting this week too.

Rock on!

Jason J.

p.s. If you are interested in perhaps performing with an improv group on a regular basis, send me an email. We are audition people for Laughing Matter which is a group I direct who performs at Rehab Centers, Homeless Shelters, Retirement Homes, and the like.
item.how_to_find_us: Room through the door to the left.
item.name: Resident Improv: AfterDing
